```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(ggpubr)
# changing working directory from /scripts to /tahoe_lab_inc_analysis
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = '..')
```

```{r}
# importing dataset for tahoe city (closest site to the pineland site)
dat_TC <- read_csv("data/Tahoe_nearshore_network_data/TC.txt")
str(dat_TC)
```

### plotting temperature (probeT) for TC site
```{r}
# filtering out period of NAs in ProbeT column
dat_TC %>%
  filter(TimeLocal < "2020-10-01 00:00:00") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = TimeLocal, y = ProbeT)) +
  geom_line()

# looking at daily scales of temp variability
daily_T <- dat_TC %>%
  mutate(day = date(TimeLocal)) %>%
  group_by(day) %>%
  summarize(avg_T = mean(ProbeT), sd_T = sd(ProbeT))
daily_T

# plot of average daily temps with error bars
daily_T %>%
  filter(day < "2020-10-01") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = day, y = avg_T)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = avg_T - sd_T, ymax = avg_T + sd_T))
```
